title.en: A Brief Prayer to the Garland of Successive Rebirths

text.en: Emaho!
text.en-trans: emaho

text.en: Out of the uncompounded sky-like expanse of the dharmadhātu,
text.en-trans: chöying dü majépé kha long né

text.en: Radiance arises unobstructedly as emptiness and clarity, the play of compassion,
text.en-trans: dang nang magak tong sal tukjé gar

text.en: And Vajrayoginī, complete with the supreme of all features,
text.en-trans: namkün chokden dorjé naljorma

text.en: Manifests like the play of the moon in water, to all who need to be trained,
text.en-trans: duljé nang ngor chudé namrol gar

text.en: Taking on infinite forms, according to what is most effective.
text.en-trans: gang dul kur zheng dzepa tayepa

text.en: To the supreme liberator of beings in every realm, I pray!
text.en-trans: dro kham yong drol chok la solwa deb

text.en: A glorious, accomplished master in the noble land of India
text.en-trans: gyagar pakyul drubpé wangchuk pal

text.en: With power over the five elements, Red Vetala,1
text.en-trans: jung ngar wang tob rolang marmo dang

text.en: And then, in Tibet, before Guru Padmākara,
text.en-trans: rim gyü böyul guru pejung drung

text.en: His consort, Shelkar Dorje Tso,
text.en-trans: ku yi zungma shelkar dorjé tso

text.en: Who gained the power of unfailing memory—to you I pray!
text.en-trans: mi jé zung tob dé la solwa deb

text.en: With Tsogyal's blessings, you took charge of profound treasures,
text.en-trans: tsogyal jin tob zabpé ter la wang

text.en: And were Kunga Buma, Changchub Chödrön and the rest—
text.en-trans: künga bumma changchub chödrön sok

text.en: To this garland of successive rebirths, I pray!
text.en-trans: ku treng rimpar gyü la solwa deb

text.en: In the heart of Tibet you were a hidden yoginī,2
text.en-trans: böyul ü su bepé naljorpa

text.en: Appearing ordinary and with mastery of profound treasures,
text.en-trans: tamal tsul dzin zabpé ter la wang

text.en: Nurturing, through various means, disciples and the two forms of terma,
text.en-trans: natsok tab kyi ter nyi dulja kyong

text.en: And leading everyone with a connection to the realm of Lotus Light—
text.en-trans: gang drel pema ö kyi zhing du dren

text.en: Dechen Dewé Dorje, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: dechen dewé dorjér solwa deb

text.en: Care for me, without ever parting, in this life, the next, and the bardo states,
text.en-trans: di chi bar sum dralmé jezung né

text.en: Lead me to realize the intent of the Luminous Great Perfection,
text.en-trans: ösal dzogchen gongpa ngöngyur té

text.en: And awaken as Samantabhadra, pure from the very beginning!
text.en-trans: kadak kuntuzangpor changchub shok
